short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Build an interactive onboarding and training experience for your web applications without coding.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Looking for a powerful tool to create software or process documentation? Look no further than HintEd Smart Manuals!
Works perfectly for:
·         Tutorials
·         Manuals
·         How-to guides
·         Process documentation
·         Employee onboarding
·         Product management
·         And countless others!

How to save hours with HintEd Smart Manuals:
·        Install and launch HintEd application
·        Easily record the process in the simple point-and click interface
·        Add comments, text formatting and media
·        Share with colleagues, export as PDF, Word, or upload to LMS!

With our easy-to-use platform, you can quickly and easily create comprehensive documentation that covers everything from basic features to complex workflows. Whether you're creating user manuals, training materials, or process documentation, HintEd Smart Manuals has everything you need to get started.

So why wait? Sign up for HintEd Smart Manuals today and start creating powerful, effective documentation that will help your team succeed!
·         Save hours on documentation
·         Share in your preferred format
·         Easily update
·         Customize
